content: easy twisted headband materials 6 5mm needles straight circular or dpns 1 x stylecraft chunky 100g acrylic wool 1 x scissors 1 x tapestry needle abbreviations co- cast on k- knit sl1p- slip one stitch purlwise wyif- with yarn in front bobble- bind off bs seam- back stitch seam method using the long tail cast on or your preferred method co 21 stitches do not join in the round row 1 slip the first stitch *k1 sl1p wyif k1- continue from * till the last stitch k1 row 2 slip the first stich *sl1p wyif k1 sl1p wyif - continue from * till the last stitch k1 the 2 row repeat is known as double stockinette continue in double stockinette until the piece measures 10cm smaller than the required head measurement i usually knit for around 47cm bobble 21 stitches making sure to leave a tail for seaming now your piece is bobble grab each of the ends and fold the ends in half now move the two folded ends into each other so they create a 4 layer sandwich make sure all the four edges are touching against each other at the top and sides using the tapestry needle thread through the tail and seam the four edges together i usually use the bs method but use any preferred method of seaming to finish turn the piece inside out so the seams are now facing inwards enjoy please ensure you make reference to sadie knits when posting photos of your work to any social pages you can sell any products created using this pattern however please do not sell in bulk again please ensure sadie knits are tagged on social media pages do not sell copy rewrite or make any changes to this pattern unless making changes for sixing requirements please feel free to check out any of my social media s if you enjoyed this pattern do also feel free to message me if you find any issues or have any concerns when reading this pattern i will be happy to assist in any way possible feedback is always welcome and can be sent to facebook- sadie knits instagram sadie_knits ravelry sadieknitsco my other patterns can be found on ravelry
